name: Vegan Carrot Cake Ice Cream Recipe
description: A vegan ice cream recipe that delivers! This dairy-free carrot cake ice cream tastes like a slice of carrot cake and is luxuriously creamy thanks to cashew nuts in the ice cream base. Way healthier and lower in calories than cake, too!  Allergy Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast, gluten.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cups broken walnuts or pecans or other nuts
1 Tablespoon ground raw sugar or other fine vegan sugar
1 can coconut milk (13.5 oz, a little less than 2 cups)
1/3 cup ground raw sugar (1/2 cup for sweeter)

itemListElement.text: Add oil to pan on medium heat. Add chopped walnuts and roast for 1-2 minutes. Stir frequently. Add the sugar, salt and spices and mix well. Continue to cook till the sugar caramelizes and sticks to the walnuts.
itemListElement.name: Add oil to pan on medium heat. Add chopped walnuts and roast for 1-2 minutes. Stir frequently. Add the sugar, salt and spices and mix well. Continue to cook till the sugar caramelizes and sticks to the walnuts.

itemListElement.text: Blend the drained soaked cashews and all the ingredients with a few Tablespoons of water to make a thick cream. Taste and adjust salt and tang if needed.
itemListElement.name: Blend the drained soaked cashews and all the ingredients with a few Tablespoons of water to make a thick cream. Taste and adjust salt and tang if needed.

itemListElement.text: Toss the carrots in a teaspoon of oil and bake at 380 degrees F for 15-20 minutes. Bake longer for larger quantity. Roast the carrots till golden on the outside.
itemListElement.name: Toss the carrots in a teaspoon of oil and bake at 380 degrees F for 15-20 minutes. Bake longer for larger quantity. Roast the carrots till golden on the outside.

itemListElement.text: Puree the roasted carrots with one cup of coconut milk until well blended.
itemListElement.name: Puree the roasted carrots with one cup of coconut milk until well blended.

itemListElement.text: Add the sugar, spices, salt and the rest of the coconut milk and almond milk and blend. Taste and adjust sweet and spice. Pour into ice cream container.
itemListElement.name: Add the sugar, spices, salt and the rest of the coconut milk and almond milk and blend. Taste and adjust sweet and spice. Pour into ice cream container.

itemListElement.text: Add the candied walnuts and fold in. Add in the sour cream, lightly sprinkle some more cinnamon on top and fold in. Do not mix too much.
itemListElement.name: Add the candied walnuts and fold in. Add in the sour cream, lightly sprinkle some more cinnamon on top and fold in. Do not mix too much.

itemListElement.text: If using an ice cream maker, let the spiced carrot puree ice cream churn, then fold in the walnuts and sour cream just before placing in freezer.
itemListElement.name: If using an ice cream maker, let the spiced carrot puree ice cream churn, then fold in the walnuts and sour cream just before placing in freezer.

itemListElement.text: Freeze for a few hours then scoop and serve.
itemListElement.name: Freeze for a few hours then scoop and serve.

keywords: carrot cake ice cream, vegan cashew ice cream, vegan ice cream recipe
